meanings.definition: The act of making something soft.
meanings.sent1: The softening of the clay made it easier to mold.
meanings.sent2: The softening of the pillow enhanced its comfort.
meanings.sent3: The softening of the cheese was a gradual process.
meanings.sent4: The softening of the light in the room created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The softening of the ice cream made it melt in the sun.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming less severe or intense.
meanings.sent1: The softening of his tone calmed the situation.
meanings.sent2: The softening of the colors in the painting gave it a more soothing look.
meanings.sent3: The softening of the punishment was a relief to the students.
meanings.sent4: The softening of the storm brought a peaceful evening.
meanings.sent5: The softening of her expression showed understanding and empathy.
